summary: REQ-14 (in-app Share UI with copy-to-clipboard + success state) appears implemented, and REQ-12 (remove external Google Fonts dependency) appears implemented via switching to local/system font stacks. However, REQ-11 (fix production build/root loading issue) is not shown as fixed because index.html still references a dev-time /src/* module entry. REQ-13 (republish and provide a new icp0.io share link) is not evidenced in code changes. Additionally, backend/main.mo was modified to an empty actor without a stated requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the deployed frontend is a proper production build (not a development entry that depends on /src/* at runtime) and that the app renders successfully at the root icp0.io domain without missing /src/* resources or 404s for entry scripts/styles/assets.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff still shows frontend/index.html loading the app via a Vite-style development entry script at '/src/main.tsx', which is exactly the runtime dependency on /src/* the requirement calls out as broken in production deployments.

missing_requirements.requirement: Republish the application to production after the fix and provide a new, working icp0.io share link.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary contains only source changes and does not include any deployment artifact, configuration, or documentation indicating a new production deployment or a new icp0.io share URL.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor logic removed/changed to an empty Motoko actor.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on fixing a broken production frontend link/build, removing Google Fonts dependency, adding a Share section, and republishing. It does not request changing backend behavior, and making backend/main.mo an empty actor is not justified by any stated requirement in the diff summary.
